author: bago
msg: 8BITMIME support while delivering. Added conversion to 7bit when the transport is not sun javamail and when the remote host does not support 8bitmime (JAMES-52).
Also re-activated by default the EHLO salutation: with HELO 8bitmime is not available. (JAMES-410)
